div.p: THE FACTOR TRIP OF THE DAY. MOST OF US HAVE PEOPLE IN THE
PAST WE REMEMBER. BUT WE HAVE LOST TRACK OF THEM.
NOW A BUNCH OF WEBSITES ARE OPERATING THAT WILL TRACK THEM
WHITE PAGES.COM WILL GET YOU ADDRESSES.
BEYOND THAT YOU HAVE TO PAY. INTELLIUS.COM CHARGES TWO BUCKS
FOR EVERY SEARCH. FACEBOOK IS FREE.
YOU CAN FIND A LOT OF FOLKS THERE.
HERE IS THE TIP OF THE DAY. YOUR PAST IS VERY IMPORTANT.
IT CAN BE RELIVED THIS A POSITIVE WAY.
IF YOU FIND SOMEBODY THAT YOU CAN SHARE MEMORIES WITH.
SO IF SOMEBODY IS IN YOUR MIND AND YOU DON’T KNOW WHAT HAPPENED
TO THEM AND YOU WOULD LIKE TO TALK TO THEM, THE INTERPRET --
THIS IS A POSITIVE THING -- CAN HELP YOU.
FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY. THAT’S IT FOR US TONIGHT.
CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS FACTOR WEBSITE WHICH IS DIFFERENT FROM
